authors: Colicchia V., Petroni M, Guarguaglini G, Sardina F, Roncero MS, Carbonari M, Ricci B, Heil C, Capalbo C, Belardinilli F, Coppa A, Peruzzi G, Screpanti I, Lavia P, Gulino A and Giuseppe G. 2017.
title: PARP inhibitors enhance replication stress and cause mitotic catastrophe in MYCN-dependent neuroblastoma.
